CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 7 Among the currently available classes of materials , thiophenefused polycyclic heteroaromatics have aroused great interest due to their high charge transport properties.

Let's think step by step.

1. Thiophenefused polycyclic heteroaromatics

These are the Material Names mentioned in the paragraph. Thiophene is a specific type of heterocyclic compound, and "polycyclic heteroaromatics" refers to a class of materials that contain multiple fused aromatic rings with heteroatoms (in this case, thiophene rings) as part of the ring structure. These materials are known for their high charge transport properties.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 7 Among the currently available classes of materials , thiophenefused polycyclic heteroaromatics have aroused great interest due to their high charge transport properties.

Let's think step by step.

1. Thiophenefused polycyclic heteroaromatics

These are the Property Name entities in the paragraph. They refer to a specific class of materials, characterized by the presence of thiophene rings fused with other polycyclic heteroaromatic structures. The interest in this class of materials is due to their high charge transport properties.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. High charge transport properties (property)

This is the relevant Property Entity in the paragraph. The paragraph mentions that thiophenefused polycyclic heteroaromatics have aroused great interest due to their high charge transport properties.
